title: Gateway National Recreation Area: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth      Family Fun at Gateway! Gateway National Recreation Area is a great place for the whole family all year long.  The National Park Service offers many programs throughout the year for kids to learn about the nature and history that's right here in their own backyard, or to bring out their creativity. They can even earn Junior Ranger badges.  Get the whole family together, and visit the Gateway site nearest you, or make a day trip to visit the other sites.  Whatever you do, kids of all ages will enjoy discovering the treasures found in our local national park!                 Sesame Street Explores Gateway National Recreation Area Follow Elmo, Murray, and Ranger Shalini as they learn about the nests, seasons, and habitats at Gateway!       New online game for kids!          http://www.nps.gov/featurecontent/gate/gateway/
